Name: nitric acid production, product in 50% solution state | steam, in chemical industry | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2012:Manufacture of fertilizers and nitrogen compounds
Description: This datasets corresponds to the technology used in African nitric acid plants. ;The nitric acid production consists of several steps: oxidation of ammonia with air to give nitric oxide and oxidation of the nitric oxide to nitrogen dioxide and absorption in water to give a solution of nitric acid. In the process, nitric oxide and water are formed.
